snippet: The Foreign Ministry of Norway expelled a Sudanese diplomat on Tuesday, accusing the envoy of spying on Sudanese refugees living in the country.
abstract: Norway's Foreign Ministry expels a Sudanese diplomat, accusing him of spying on Sudanese refugees in Norway.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry of Norway expelled a Sudanese diplomat on Tuesday, accusing the envoy of spying on Sudanese refugees living in the country.

headline.seo: Sudanese Diplomat Is Expelled From Norway
